ai.skymind.pipelines.util.image

Class Java2DNativeImageLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.image.loader.BaseImageLoader
      • ai.skymind.pipelines.util.image.NativeImageLoader
        • ai.skymind.pipelines.util.image.Java2DNativeImageLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Java2DNativeImageLoader
extends NativeImageLoader
    Segregates functionality specific to Java 2D that is not available on Android.
    Author:
    saudet
    See Also:
